mapper.select: select m.name from ieg_school_major m left join ieg_school_major_features mf on m.id = mf.school_major_id where m.delete_flag = 'Used' and m.school_id = #{schoolId} and mf.id is not null group by m.name

select m.name, mer.year, mer.score_min from ieg_school_major m LEFT join ieg_school_major_enroll_record mer on m.id = mer.school_major_id where m.school_id = #{schoolId} order by mer.year desc, mer.score_min desc limit 0, 5
